column5: I am taking my father to Esnagi Lake, Camp Esnagi for his 70th birthday July 14-21. Also going are my wife, 12 year old son and 14 year old daughter. I have studied the lake using the great satellite photos on the Fish On-line Ontario MNR site. Looking for helpful fishing tips or locations from past fisherman to the lake. Also looking for cool places to explore on the lake as my kids won't want to fish all the time.
